comments.raw_text:
Not sure how repeatable this is:
1. Be on yesterday's build and have it up
2. let the machine sleep until the next day
3. wake the machine up and when the update notification comes up select that
4. update the browser
5. go to mail, and open a link.

Expected: no hang
Actual: hang
comments.author: nhirata.bugzilla@gmail.com
